className.transform: const variants = { text: 'rounded h-4', rectangular: 'rounded-none', circular: 'rounded-full', rounded: 'rounded-lg' }; const cn = (await import('@/lib/utils')).cn; return cn('bg-muted animate-pulse', variants[data || 'rectangular'], props.className)

style.transform: const { width, height } = props; return { width: typeof width === 'number' ? `${width}px` : width, height: typeof height === 'number' ? `${height}px` : height }
